attributes.action: Let the Ghurka Soldiers remain in Great Britain after they have served us so bravely.  They deserve UK Citizenship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All personnel who serve in Her Majestys Armed Forces (Army Navy and Air Force) should be granted UK Citizenship.  They have and will fight bravely for this country therefore they deserve to live here amongst those they have fought for. We owe them a large debt of gratitude.  This is the least we can do to redress the balance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
